list.name: Default
list.comment: Updated functional and unit tests to include edit hop records feature.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Added functional tests, homebrewdatabase added to INSTALLED_APPS in settings.py, urls.py setup to redirect homebrewdatabase app. Also added index.html placeholder in templates and .gitignore.
moved templates directory under homebrewdatabase app.
Wrote first passing unit test to render template. Added index.html basic text and added urls.py to homebrewdatabase app.
First passing functional and unittests. Home page and homebrew database pages added with custom css.
Refactored to use Bootstrap, template and Awesome Font. All functional and unit tests passing.
Functional and unit tests checking that site can redirect to database page and hops catalogue page passing.
Added working basic modal. Functional tests still failing, waiting for form validation.
Converted modal to form. Functional and unit tests confirm POST requests working and saving to table.
Added request parameter to unit test. New to Django 1.9. All functional and unit tests passing.
Full passing functional and unit tests to verify that a user can add form via modal and see the results on the hops record table.
Passing unit test for saving Hop records to database.
Hop page now saves Hop record and redirects back to main hops page. Tests generating new hops records. Functional and unit tests passing.
Functional tests moved to tests.py. Moved to StaticLiveServerTestCase. Load staticfiles tags added. Removed type from views.py. All functional and unit tests passing.

Separated hops list view from hops add view. Moved modal into addhop.html. Added form model, functional and unit tests verify hops page can open modal form, save a hops record and redirect back to the hops list page to see the updated list.

Separated hops list view from hops add view. Moved modal into addhop.html. Added form model, functional and unit tests verify hops page can open modal form, save a hops record and redirect back to the hops list page to see the updated list.
Refactored to use django url tags instead of hard coded urls
